title: Data Science- Intro to Statistics

metadata.description: Learn about Data Science- Intro to Statistics with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Introduction to Statistics
Statistics is the science of analyzing data.
When we have created a model for prediction, we must assess the prediction's 
reliability.
After all, what is a prediction worth, if we cannot rely on it?
Descriptive Statistics
We will first cover some basic descriptive statistics.
Descriptive statistics summarizes important features of a data set such as:
Count
Sum
Standard Deviation
Percentile
Average
Etc..
It is a good starting point to become familiar with the data.
We can use the
describe()
function in Python to summarize the data:
Example
print (full_health_data.describe())

Output:
Do you see anything interesting here?

★
+1

The correct definition of Intro to Statistics

quiz.question: What is what?
quiz.explanation: The correct definition of what is 'a prediction worth'.

summary: This tutorial covers Data Science- Intro to Statistics concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use Data Science- Intro to Statistics effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of Data Science- Intro to Statistics and how to apply it in your projects.
